contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German district| name=Coburg| state=Bavaria| capital=[[Coburg, Germany|Coburg]]| regierungsbezirk=[[Upper Franconia]]| region=Oberfranken-West| area=592|Kreisschlüssel = 09473 | population=92,200| population_as_of=2001| density=156| carsign=CO| url=[http://www.landkreis-coburg.de landkreis-coburg.de]| map=Bavaria co.png }} '''Coburg''' is a district in [[Bavaria]], [[Germany]]. It is bounded by (from the east and clockwise) the districts of [[Kronach (district)|Kronach]], [[Lichtenfels (district)|Lichtenfels]], [[Bamberg (district)|Bamberg]] and [[Haßberge (district)|Haßberge]], and by the state of [[Thuringia]] (districts [[Hildburghausen (district)|Hildburghausen]] and [[Sonneberg (district)|Sonneberg]]). The district surrounds, but does not include the city of [[Coburg, Germany|Coburg]]. == History == The history of the district is largely influenced by the city of Coburg. From 1826 to 1918, the region was part of the small duchy of [[Saxe-Coburg-Gotha]] (see [[Thuringia]]). In a [[referendum]] from 1919, the Coburg portion of this state decided to join Bavaria (united in 1920). The present district is identical to that portion, but excludes the city of Coburg and the exclave of Königsberg, which is part of Haßberge district. The city of Neustadt was a district-free city until 1972 and was then incorporated into the district. == Geography == The district is located in the hilly country between the [[Thuringian Slate Mountains]] and the [[Main (river)|Main]] valley. == Coat of arms == {| |- valign=top ||[[File:Wappen landkreis coburg.svg|100px|Coat of arms]] ||The arms consist of the blue and white checkered pattern of Bavaria and the arms of the [[Wettin (dynasty)|Wettin]] dynasty of [[Saxony]]. These arms represent the historic affiliations to both states. |} == Towns and municipalities == {| ! align=left width=33%|Towns ! align=left width=33%|Municipalities ! align=left width=33%| |- valign=top || #[[Bad Rodach]] #[[Neustadt bei Coburg]] #[[Rödental]] #[[Seßlach]] || #[[Ahorn, Bavaria|Ahorn]] #[[Dörfles-Esbach]] #[[Ebersdorf bei Coburg]] #[[Großheirath]] #[[Grub am Forst]] #[[Itzgrund]] || <ol start=7> <li> [[Lautertal, Bavaria|Lautertal]] <li> [[Meeder]] <li> [[Niederfüllbach]] <li> [[Sonnefeld]] <li> [[Untersiemau]] <li> [[Weidhausen]] <li> [[Weitramsdorf]] </ol> |} ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == {{commonscat|Landkreis Coburg}} *[http://www.landkreis-coburg.de Official website] (German) {{Germany_districts_bavaria}} {{coord|50|16|N|10|55|E|region:DE_type:adm2nd|display=title}} [[Category:Districts of Bavaria]] [[Category:Coburg (district)| ]]
